MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install openjdk-7-jre

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/java java /usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_05/bin/java 100 sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/javac javac /usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_05/bin/javac 100

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: sudo apt-get install tomcat7-admin #admin web applications sudo apt-get install tomcat7-user #tools to create user instances

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: sudo yum install w3m w3m-img w3m http://localhost:8080
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT -A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 443 -j ACCEPT
